where.if: AND ( ( vf_tax_detail.tax_actual IS NOT NULL AND vf_tax_detail.tax_actual > 0) OR ( vf_transpotation_detail.transpotation_amount IS NOT NULL AND vf_transpotation_detail.transpotation_amount > 0) OR ( vf_transpotation_detail.mail_fee IS NOT NULL AND vf_transpotation_detail.mail_fee > 0) OR ( vf_bs_incidentals_detail.ground_handling_fee IS NOT NULL AND vf_bs_incidentals_detail.ground_handling_fee > 0) OR ( vf_bs_incidentals_detail.storage_charges IS NOT NULL AND vf_bs_incidentals_detail.storage_charges > 0) )

AND ( ( vf_tax_detail.tax_actual IS NOT NULL AND vf_tax_detail.tax_actual > 0) OR ( vf_transpotation_detail.transpotation_amount IS NOT NULL AND vf_transpotation_detail.transpotation_amount > 0) OR ( vf_transpotation_detail.mail_fee IS NOT NULL AND vf_transpotation_detail.mail_fee > 0) OR ( vf_bs_incidentals_detail.ground_handling_fee IS NOT NULL AND vf_bs_incidentals_detail.ground_handling_fee > 0) OR ( vf_bs_incidentals_detail.storage_charges IS NOT NULL AND vf_bs_incidentals_detail.storage_charges > 0) )

mapper.select:
select count(1) FROM bi_master.vf_bc_track_detail AS vf_bc_track_detail LEFT JOIN bi_master.vf_track_orders AS vf_track_orders ON vf_bc_track_detail.tracking_no = vf_track_orders.tracking_no LEFT JOIN bi_master.vf_tax_detail AS vf_tax_detail ON vf_bc_track_detail.tracking_no = vf_tax_detail.tracking_no LEFT JOIN bi_master.vf_transpotation_detail AS vf_transpotation_detail ON vf_bc_track_detail.tracking_no = vf_transpotation_detail.tracking_no LEFT JOIN bi_master.vf_bs_incidentals_detail AS vf_bs_incidentals_detail ON vf_bc_track_detail.main_waybill_num = vf_bs_incidentals_detail.main_waybill_num LEFT JOIN bi_master.vf_idcard AS idcard ON vf_bc_track_detail.source_order_id = idcard.source_order_id
ORDER BY vf_bc_track_detail.year_calc, vf_bc_track_detail.month_calc, vf_bc_track_detail.order_channel_name
